Current Research

    Overview Coastal Plain wetlands and stream networks Wetlands, Stream Networks, and Carbon Natural, Restored, Agricultural Wetlands; Intermittent channels

Recent and Past Research

    Recent Research National River Restoration Synthesis Project

Overview

The broad objective of Dr. Palmer's research is to understand what controls stream and wetland ecosystem structure and function. She focuses extensively on restoration ecology as well as how land use, hydrology, and geomorphology influence ecosystem dynamics.

Research Interests

  • Freshwater Ecosystems
  • Restoration Ecology
